R

rateOfExploitation - Variable in class capitalism.model.Global
 
reCalculateStockTotalValuesAndPrices() - Method in class capitalism.model.Stock
When the unit price or the unit value of a commodity changes, the price and value of each stock changes accordingly This method enacts the change.
refreshDisplay() - Static method in class capitalism.view.ViewManager
Repopulate each ViewTable with its observable list.
refreshTables() - Static method in class capitalism.view.tables.TabbedTableViewer
we have to force a refresh of the display because if the data has not changed, it may not be observed by the table see https://stackoverflow.com/questions/11065140/javafx-2-1-tableview-refresh-items i have kept this method separate from populateTabbedTables() because the issue merits further study.
refreshTimeStampTable() - Static method in class capitalism.view.ViewManager
builds the main treeView which displays the results of the simulation
regenerate() - Method in class capitalism.model.SocialClass
regenerate the labour power of this class NOTE any class might theoretically sell labour power and some classes will be mixed, for example small commodity producers So the worker/capitalist distinction, if made, is a property of a particular project, in that if there is a full separation, one class (in the project) will sell labour power and will have no property revenue whereas another will sell no labour power and will only receive property revenue (TODO this is as yet underdeveloped because we have to develop the different types of property-based revenue such as land etc)
registerLabourResponse(Simulation.LABOUR_SUPPLY_RESPONSE) - Method in class capitalism.command.Demand
Primitive response function for the supply of Labour Power
replenishmentCosts() - Method in class capitalism.model.Industry
calculate the cost of replenishing the inputs, from the productive stocks
replenishmentDemand() - Method in class capitalism.model.Commodity
The total replenishment demand from all stocks of this commodity
replenishmentDemand - Variable in class capitalism.model.Stock
 
repopulateTabbedTables() - Method in class capitalism.view.tables.TabbedTableViewer
refresh the data in all the tabbed tables.
report(Logger, int, String, Object...) - Static method in class capitalism.utils.Reporter
Report a message at the INFO level.
Reporter - Class in capitalism.utils
The full functionality of the logging API is not really needed in this project.
Reporter() - Constructor for class capitalism.utils.Reporter
Empty constructor which does not initialise logWindow See notes on Reporter.createLogWindow()
resetWage() - Method in class capitalism.command.PriceDynamics
Not used yet.
restart() - Method in class capitalism.utils.DBHandler
reinitialise the whole database with the opening SQL queries and the user data assumes the connection is already open
restart() - Static method in class capitalism.view.ViewManager
Complete re-initialisation of the whole database from user data.
restartButton - Static variable in class capitalism.view.custom.DisplayControls
 
RestartCommand - Class in capitalism.view.custom.command
 
RestartCommand() - Constructor for class capitalism.view.custom.command.RestartCommand
 
Revenue - Class in capitalism.command
 
Revenue() - Constructor for class capitalism.command.Revenue
 
revenue - Variable in class capitalism.model.SocialClass
 
rightButtonBar - Static variable in class capitalism.view.custom.DisplayControls
 
rootLayout - Static variable in class capitalism.view.ViewManager
 
round(double) - Static method in class capitalism.utils.MathStuff
 
roundingPrecision - Static variable in class capitalism.utils.MathStuff
